channel.title: Posts on Meeting Webpage for the Fundamental Computing Group at the RUG
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Meeting Webpage for the Fundamental Computing Group at the RUG
channel.copyright: Website made for the Fundamental Computing Group at the University of Groningen

item.title: Fourth Meeting
item.description: The third meeting for the reading group will take place on Thursday 13th, June at 1pm (13h), in room 466a in the 4th floor of the Bernoulliborg. The paper to be read is called Run your research: on the effectiveness of lightweight mechanization by Casey Klein, et al. You can follow the link below to go to the article. Here

item.title: Second Meeting
item.description: The second meeting will take a place on the 21st of March at 13h. The review article to be read is Separation Logic by Peter O’Hearn and it can be found here.

item.title: Kickstart Meeting
item.description: The first meeting date will be on the 21st of February at 13h. The paper to be read is called Context-free Session types by Peter Thiemann and Vasco Vasconcelos. It can be found here.

item.title: Welcome Post
item.description: Welcome to this website. In here members of the Fundamental Commputing Research Group of the University of Groningen will publish the dates and papers for the Reading Group Meetings and other useful information.
